channel.title: Times of India
channel.description: The Times of India: Breaking news, views, reviews, cricket from across India

item.title: 35 Chinese soldiers return to Ladakh’s Chumar, sit on a hillock
item.description: Hours after withdrawing from the Chumar region in Ladakh, Chinese PLA soldiers were reported to have crossed into Indian territory again.

item.title: BJP softens stand, says it always sacrificed to save alliance with Shiv Sena
item.description: In a mild softening of its stand, the state BJP said it has decided to send a fresh seat-sharing formula to the Sena before making any final move on the matter.

item.title: New US envoy to India brings wealth of experience to diplomatic table
item.description: Richard Verma remembers the time when he was a little kid, seeing his mom in her sari waiting for a bus to go to work in sub-zero centigrade temperatures in blowing and drifting snow.

item.title: Britain to learn from Bihar’s phenomenal transformation
item.description: Britain is all set to learn from Bihar’s phenomenal transformation from one of India’s most backward to the country’s fastest growing state.

item.title: World watches Mars Orbiter Mission’s quest for methane
item.description: Is it time to plan human colonies on Mars like former Isro chairman U R Rao had once said? The idea seems far-fetched with the Red Planet still largely unexplored, notwithstanding several probes by many countries.
